meanings.sent1: The mishmashes of toys on the floor made it hard to walk.
meanings.sent2: She created delicious mishmashes of fruits in her smoothie.
meanings.sent3: The mishmashes of colors in the painting gave it a unique charm.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a mishmashes of thoughts, all tangled up.
meanings.sent5: The mishmashes of sounds at the carnival were overwhelming.

meanings.sent1: The mishmashes of flavors in the stew were surprisingly tasty.
meanings.sent2: The mishmashes of scents in the garden were delightful.
meanings.sent3: Her outfit was a mishmashes of patterns, but somehow it worked.
meanings.sent4: The mishmashes of emotions in the room were palpable.
meanings.sent5: The mishmashes of voices in the choir created a beautiful harmony.
